lexUnit.name: cap.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a soft, flat hat without a brim and usually with a peak.

sentence.text: She got to her feet , checked her cap in the little mirror on the wall and marched out into her department .
A civilian with the grey wool skull cap of the Svan people , from the high glens of Georgia , jumped up to help .

He was wearing a peaked cap of brown leather and a long black overcoat .
